```{r}
data <- read.csv(here("data", "data_export_20240424.csv"), sep = ";")
```

## Replace "Not Available" with NA

```{r}
# Replace "Not Available" with NA in specified columns
energy_data <- data %>%
  mutate(
    Solar_Energy_Production = na_if(Solar_Energy_Production, "Not Available"),
    Wind_Energy_Production = na_if(Wind_Energy_Production, "Not Available")
  )

# Check the structure to ensure changes are applied
str(energy_data)
```

## Convert Month into Date

```{r}
energy_data$Month <- as.Date(energy_data$Month, format = "%d.%m.%y")
```

## Plot Data

```{r}
# Coal Production
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(energy_data, aes(x = Month, y = Coal_Production)) + 
  geom_line() + 
  labs(title = "Time Series Plot", x = "Date", y = "Value")

summary(energy_data$Coal_Production)

# Natural Gas Dry Production
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(energy_data, aes(x = Month, y = Natural_Gas_Dry_Production)) + 
  geom_line() +
```
